item.description:
First Degree Reiki Certification training will be held on Saturday, Oct. 20, 9:30-4:00
for anyone interested in learning this simple, hands on healing method. This is traditional Usui Reiki. You will learn the history of Reiki, the hand positions, practice Reiki and receive the First Degree Reiki attunements. You will also learn how to start a business with Reiki. Use Reiki to practice on freiends, family, pets and clients. It's simple and fun. Contact Judy if you are interested: 781-639-1236
item.name: First Degree Reiki Certification training
